rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Miracle* [/i]– Whenever another creature you control dies, you may pay {2}. If you do, exile it from your graveyard with four time counters on them. That card gains suspend if it did not have suspend.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of combat during your turn, if own three or more cards in exile, transform Finn, Leif's Protector.
